top_comments.comment: You know what I was in a holding cell once and I would have loved one if those dorms in comparison, get out of your ivory tower Hayes!

comments_since_last_sample.body: This perspective of the state of affairs is the clearest and most accurate understanding I have heard yet.  I hope many more listen to these words.
It's ridiculous that fox is permitted to continue broadcasting hate speech clothed in constitutional tinder.
The fall of America began with regan. Allow this evil to die a peaceful death of non-support. VOTE BLUE IN 22&24.
